statements: SELECT * FROM Location
SELECT city, country FROM Location
SELECT * FROM Location WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM Location WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT * FROM Location ORDER BY city DESC
SELECT * FROM Location ORDER BY city ASC, country DESC;
SELECT city, COUNT(*) as count FROM Location GROUP BY city HAVING count > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM Location WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT city, CHECK_IN FROM Location WHERE country = 'USA' AND CHECK_IN >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT city, COUNT(*) as count FROM Location GROUP BY city ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT * FROM location_data;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, model_url FROM ar_objects WHERE location_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT id, address FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 30;
SELECT * FROM location_data
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE id = 3 ORDER BY latitude DESC
SELECT name, model_url FROM ar_objects WHERE location_id = 5
SELECT * FROM location_data INNER JOIN ar_objects ON location_data.id = ar_objects.location_id
SELECT address, longitude FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 40
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM landmarks ORDER BY landmark_id DESC;
SELECT landmark_name, landmark_description FROM landmarks WHERE location_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_id, address, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM landmarks WHERE landmark_name LIKE 'Ma%' AND location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM locations WHERE longitude > 0);

SELECT users.username, locations.address, landmarks.landmark_name FROM users INNER JOIN locations ON users.location_id = locations.location_id INNER JOIN landmarks ON locations.location_id = landmarks.location_id;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE location_id = (SELECT location_id FROM locations WHERE address LIKE '%Street%');
SELECT * FROM Locations;
SELECT id, name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT model_name, description FROM ARModels ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, location_id, rating FROM Ratings WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT model_name, description FROM ARModels ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT Users.username, Locations.name, Ratings.rating FROM Users JOIN Ratings ON Users.id = Ratings.user_id JOIN Locations ON Ratings.location_id = Locations.id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE location_point IS NOT NULL;
SELECT notification_id, message, notification_time FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_time DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE start_time > '2023-01-01' AND end_time < '2023-12-31';
SELECT place_name, location_point FROM places WHERE ST_Distance(location_point, POINT(0,0)) < 1000;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT place_name, location_point FROM places WHERE place_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT MAX(checkin_time) as last_checkin FROM check_ins WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT event_id, event_name, start_time, end_time FROM events ORDER BY start_time DESC;
